name: HxBubbles Pop - A game prototype for HaxeFlixel
name_original: HxBubbles Pop - A game prototype for HaxeFlixel
description:
Here you can find the repositoryof the game.

I am making 10 simple game prototypes with HaxeFlixel as a fun way to learn! This is the 6th.

Background used: https://www.freepik.com/free-photo/notebook-blue-wood-table_1287506.htm#page=1&q...

Designed by vectorpouch / Freepik

Sticky notes used: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/sticky-notes-illustration-paper-memo-differe...

Designed by vectorpouch / Freepik
